alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 2:37AM PST until January 31 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with localized gusts to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Trinity, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Southwestern Mendocino Interior and Southeastern Mendocino Interior Counties, with the highest gusts in exposed higher terrain areas. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lower elevation populated areas such as Covelo, Redwood Valley, and Ukiah are expected to have maximum gusts 30 to 35 mph due to their sheltered valley locations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
